src_original: asaṁgnārāmeṇaca bhavitavyaṁ sarvanimittāmanāsikāreṇa paryāṅvadṛdyā niṣīditavyaṁ tatreka statha-āgato manasikarttavyaḥ |  sarvadharmmāśa-acamanasikarttavyāḥ |
tacca nāmadheyaṁ śrutvopalabhya yasyāt diśisa (105)  tathāgata staṁdiśa māmūkhīkṛtyaniṣīdinavyāṁtamevatathāgataṁmanasikūrvatāṁ |

tatkasmāddhetorekamidaṁtachāgata tvayathā maṁjūśrīrekasya tathāgatasyā prameyābūddhaguṇā apreyaṁpratibha-ānaṁ evaṁmaṇūśra-īrekavyūha samādhimāgaṁmya ekasyānūtpādakyāprameyādharmmaparyyāyaviśeṣoḥ pratikāṁkṣitavyāyakya pravakyantoye cata yānairarha bhirahabhdiḥ samyakkaṁ būddherbhāṣitāḥ yāvantaḥ khalūpunarāvande na dha-āritāstā vantāsyadharmma paryyāyāḥ pratibhāṣānti |  ithaṁ khalū pūnareka vyūhaṁ samādhinidhāya yāvadasyāyūḥ pramāṇasyānnā vadanisthana sanidānaṁdharmmadeśayamānaḥ ||
